overview: Christian is responsible for building the Inspirato brand internationally. He oversees all international strategic initiatives, business development, sales and marketing. Christian began his career as one of the first employees at Exclusive Resorts, opened the company’s offices in New York City and became Exclusive Resorts’ top salesperson. He continued his career in luxury real estate as Director at Palazzo Tornabuoni in Florence, Italy - one of the most exclusive residence clubs and real estate developments in Europe. Christian earned a bachelor’s degree from the University of Virginia and an MBA from Columbia Business School.
